markdownRemark.html:
Blep is the fastest growing, leading blockchain intelligence platform, making alternative data accessible to humans, AI, and everyone in between. We focus on real time blockchain and blockchain-adjacent data, and offer a library of over 50,000 real time streams of raw metrics and insights. Our consumer beta is available at https://analytics.blep.ai.

Blep is a small but ambitious team consisting of builders, researchers, and adventurers with extensive experience both in and out of the blockchain industry. Our team is fully decentralized and we plan to have a global presence.

Feel free to check out our Twitter (@blepai) and Telegram (@blepai) for latest updates.

Job Description

We are looking for a devops engineer to assist with scaling up Blep. You will be contributing directly to the design and development of dev tooling, infrastructure, and alerting systems.

You will have a chance to develop professionally and personally while working on disruptive solutions in a new trillion dollar industry. There is no geographic requirement.

Potential roles and responsibilities:

  • Building and maintaining tools, solutions and microservices associated with deployment and our operations platform, ensuring that all meet our customer service standards and reduce errors. Actively troubleshoot any issues that arise during testing and production, catching and solving issues before launch.
  • Automate our operational processes as needed, with accuracy and in compliance with our security requirements.
  • Deploy product updates as required while implementing integrations when they arise.
  • Actively troubleshoot any issues that arise during testing and production, catching and solving issues before launch.
  • Monitoring and metrics integration
  • Alerts
  • Continuous Integration / Deployment
  • Optimizing data storage, transfer, and retrieval for large amounts of data
  • Quick paced and wide variety of responsibilities

Requirements

  • Git
  • Docker/Kubernetes
  • Experience with Unix and scripting languages
  • Strong experience with relational databases such as PostgreSQL
  • High level of interest in blockchain/decentralized/distributed technology
  • Self-learner, as there are updates in the blockchain industry every day
  • 2+ internships or 1 year of experience as a software engineer or in infrastructure (substantial side projects can substitute)
  • Our team speaks in English for all technical matters

Preferred/Bonus

  • Helm
  • Experience with cloud services
  • Experience with software development
  • Time series databases
  • Running blockchain nodes
  • Advanced SQL
  • Interest in cryptocurrency industry: Consensus models, token economics, etc
  • Trading experience
  • A Github with code samples!

Additional openings

  • backend engineer
  • UI/frontend/data visualization engineer
  • quantitative finance
  • Blockchain engineer
  • Devops engineer
  • crypto trader
  • Designer
  • NLP / data science / machine learning role
